mapper.select: select * from USERDETAIL,TBLUSER where USRID = #{id} AND USERDETAIL.usrNum = TBLUSER.usrNum

select club.cbtype, club.cbleadernum, club.cbname, club.cbnum from club,clubmember where club.cbnum = clubmember.cbnum and clubmember.usrnum = #{usrNum} and club.CBFINALSTATE = '진행중' and clubmember.cbmbstresult = '가입승인' order by clubmember.cbappdate

select cbnum,cbname,cbtype from clubjoinhistory where USRNUM = #{usrNum} and CBJOINSTATERESULT = '승인대기' and (clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum,clubjoinhistory.cbnum,clubjoinhistory.usrnum) in (SELECT MAX(cbjoinnum),cbnum,usrnum FROM clubjoinhistory GROUP BY cbnum,usrnum)
select * from CLUBJOINHISTORY where USRNUM = #{usrNum} and CBJOINSTATERESULT = '모임탈퇴'
mapper.update: update TBLUSER set USRPHONE = #{usrPhone}, USRPWD = #{usrPwd}, USRSTATE = #{usrState}, USRIMG = #{usrImg}, USRIMGPATH = #{usrImgPath} where USRNUM = #{usrNum}
mapper.insert: insert into USERHISTORY(usrHistoryNum, usrNum, usrName, usrState, usrStateUpdateDate) values(userhistory_seq.nextval, #{usrNum}, #{usrName}, #{usrState}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from CLUB where CBLEADERNUM = #{usNum} and CBFINALSTATE != '폐쇄' AND CBFINALSTATE != '강제폐쇄' order by cbNum asc
select * from CLUB,THUNDERDETAIL where CLUB.CBNUM = #{cbNum} and CLUB.CBNUM = THUNDERDETAIL.CBNUM and CBNAME = #{cbName}
mapper.update: update USERDETAIL set USRCITY1 = #{usrCity1}, USRDISTRICT1 = #{usrDistrict1}, USRCITY2 = #{usrCity2}, USRDISTRICT2 = #{usrDistrict2}, USRCATEGORY1 = #{usrCategory1}, USRCATEGORY2 = #{usrCategory2} where USRNUM = #{usrNum}
mapper.select: select * from REGION where RGCLASSIFICATIONCODE is null
select * from REGION where RGCLASSIFICATIONCODE = (select RGCODE from region where RGNAME = #{rgName})
select USRIMG, USRIMGPATH from TBLUSER where USRIMGPATH = to_char(sysdate -1,'yyyy\mm\dd')

select * from tbluser, clubjoinhistory where cbnum = #{cbNum} and clubjoinhistory.usrnum = tbluser.usrnum and clubjoinhistory.cbjoinstateresult in ('가입승인','승인대기') and (clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum,clubjoinhistory.cbnum,clubjoinhistory.usrnum) in (SELECT MAX(cbjoinnum),cbnum,usrnum FROM clubjoinhistory GROUP BY cbnum,usrnum)
mapper.insert: insert into CLUBJOINHISTORY(CBJOINNUM, USRNUM, CBNUM, CBNAME, CBTYPE,CBJOINSTATERESULT,CBJOINSTATEUPDATEDATE) values(clubjoinhistory_seq.nextval, #{usrNum}, #{cbNum}, #{cbName}, #{cbType}, #{cbJoinStateResult}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update CLUB set CBFINALSTATE = '폐쇄', CBSHUTDATE = sysdate where CBNUM = #{cbNum}
mapper.insert: insert into CLUBMEMBER(USRNUM, USRNAME, CBNUM, CBTYPE, CBNAME, CBMBSTRESULT,CBMEMINTRO,CBAPPDATE) values(#{usrNum},#{usrName},#{cbNum}, #{cbType}, #{cbName}, #{cbJoinStateResult}, #{cbMemIntro}, sysdate)
